title: Number of committed crimes , by type U.S. 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Type of crime in the x axis and Number of committed crimes in the y axis.
The Number of committed crimes is highest at Type of crime Property crime  (total) and lowest at Type of crime Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter.
The difference of Number of committed crimes between the highest and lowest Type of crime is 7179831.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of committed crimes for 9 number of Type of crimes.
Type of crime Property crime  (total) has the highest Number of committed crimes and Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter has the lowest Number of committed crimes.
The second highest Number of committed crimes is appeared to be the Type of crime Larceny-theft.
The difference of Number of committed crimes between the highest and lowest Type of crime is 7179831.0.

The Type of crime Property crime  (total) has the highest Number of committed crimes, followed by Larceny-theft, and Burglary. Down to the Type of crime Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter which is the lowest.
The Type of crime Property crime  (total) tends to be 3.84 percent higher than average.
